title: Super Slow Download
body:
Not 100% sure why the Alpha Client Download is taking so long...

https://i.imgur.com/3aPDcGO.png

I have 100/40 as per this speedtest...

http://www.speedtest.net/result/5716957429.png

replies.body:
So I did some additional investigation and found that there is an issue with the Alpha Client and Avast Firewall.

Disabling the Avast Firewall to get the download completed made a massive difference.

If you do that, make sure you enable it after.
